name: are-na
title: Are.na
description: This is a raycast extension to interface with your are.na channels
author: alvinkobe

commands.name: search-channels
commands.title: Search Arena Channels
commands.description: This command allows you to search for a channel on are.na

commands.name: search-blocks
commands.title: Search Arena Blocks
commands.description: This command allows you to search for blocks on are.na

commands.name: search-users
commands.title: Search Arena Users
commands.description: This command allows you to search for users on are.na

commands.name: create-channel
commands.title: Create Channel
commands.subtitle: Create an Are.na Channel
commands.description: This commands allows you to create an are.na channel to your account

preferences.name: accessToken
preferences.label: Are.na API Key
preferences.description: Enter your personal Are.na API Key
preferences.title: API Key

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
